评论详情: My daughter is in her "black" stage of outerwear. Everything has to be black. You can mix it up with graphics, but that is about it.  This shirt fit right in with her wardrobe. If this is the aesthetic you are looking for, look no further.  It came exactly as pictured. My daughter wears medium and medium fit.  Its made of nice comfy cotton. A little bit stretchy. Perfect for those summer days of hiding inside.

评论概述: A nice regular cotton shirt with a little stretch
评论详情: This shirt is touted as a  'High Quality Cotton' and 'Super soft fabric'.  I believe it is made of cotton with 5% spandex.  It's a regular cotton shirt, slightly better than the discounted souvenir cotton shirts.  I'll wear it as a casual wear at home or on the beach.  At $17.99, it's over-priced.
